about_the_game: Impromptu Trip is a relaxing casual game. In the game, you will play a girl who is tired of urban working life. Due to long-term pressure, she decided to take an unexpected trip. You come Arriving at a small island with beautiful scenery, you can enjoy a different life on the island, make friends with different characters, and experience many different extreme activities. Moreover, you can make the entire game more interesting by interacting and exploring content. I hope you can relax and have a pleasant experience in the game.
detailed_description: Impromptu Trip is a relaxing casual game. In the game, you will play a girl who is tired of urban working life. Due to long-term pressure, she decided to take an unexpected trip. You come Arriving at a small island with beautiful scenery, you can enjoy a different life on the island, make friends with different characters, and experience many different extreme activities. Moreover, you can make the entire game more interesting by interacting and exploring content. I hope you can relax and have a pleasant experience in the game.
name: Impromptu Trip Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX660
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: i7-10700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1660
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Beautiful tropical islands, rock climbing, driving, bungee jumping, sea riding... Are you ready to start this wonderful trip?
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
